mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_${shardId} (id, alibaba_id, name, sex, identity, email, phone, telephone, fax, live_province, live_city, address, pcode, position, company_name, company_url_in_alibaba, credit_year, head_image_url, birthday, blood_type, hometown, income, educat, religion, profile, interests, self_intr, member_acc, register_time, last_login, create_time, update_time) VALUES ( #{id}, #{alibabaId}, #{name}, #{sex, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{identity, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{telephone}, #{fax}, #{liveProvince}, #{liveCity}, #{address}, #{pcode}, #{position}, #{companyName}, #{companyUrlInAlibaba}, #{creditYear}, #{headImageUrl}, #{birthday}, #{bloodType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{hometown}, #{income, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{educat, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{religion, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{profile}, #{interests}, #{selfIntr}, #{memberAcc}, #{registTime}, #{lastLogin}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
